``` {r}
library(readr)
StateAndCategory <- read_csv("StateAndCategory.csv")
```
``` {r}
library(tidyverse)
StateAndCategory$...14 <- NULL
StateAndCategory$...15 <- NULL
StateAndCategory$...16 <- NULL
StateAndCategory$...17 <- NULL
StateAndCategory$...18 <- NULL
```

```{r}
States <- StateAndCategory[1:88924, ]
```

```{r}
s <- gsub("$","", States$Dollars, fixed = TRUE)
s <- gsub(",","", s, fixed = TRUE)
States$Dollars <- as.numeric(s)
```

```{r}
s <- gsub("$","", States$`Dollars last year`, fixed = TRUE)
s <- gsub(",","", s, fixed = TRUE)
States$`Dollars last year` <- as.numeric(s)
```

```{r}
s <- gsub("$","", States$`Dollars 3 years ago`, fixed = TRUE)
s <- gsub(",","", s, fixed = TRUE)
States$`Dollars 3 years ago` <- as.numeric(s)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(States, aes(`Unit sales`)) + geom_density(alpha = 0.2)

```
